list.name: uvmt_cv32e40p
list.cmd: cd cv32e40p/sim/uvmt; make corev-dv CV_CORE=cv32e40p SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work DSIM_RESULTS=/mux-flow/build/results; make comp CV_CORE=cv32e40p SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work DSIM_RESULTS=/mux-flow/build/results
list.wavesCmd: cd cv32e40p/sim/uvmt; make corev-dv CV_CORE=cv32e40p SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work DSIM_RESULTS=/mux-flow/build/results; make comp CV_CORE=cv32e40p SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work DSIM_RESULTS=/mux-flow/build/results WAVES=1
